original_text: I will make the king of Babylon powerful, to fight battles on my behalf. But I will cause Pharaoh to be weak. He will cry in pain when the king of Babylon attacks. He will receive wounds that cause him to die. I will make the king of Babylon powerful, to fight battles on my behalf. But I will cause Pharaoh to be weak. He will cry in pain when the king of Babylon attacks. He will receive wounds that cause him to die.
korean_text: 내가 바벨론 왕의 팔을 견고하게 하고 내 칼을 그 손에 넘겨 주려니와 내가 바로의 팔을 꺾으리니 그가 바벨론 왕 앞에서 고통하기를 죽게 상한 자의 고통하듯 하리라

sentences.original_text: I will make the king of Babylon powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 바빌론 왕을 강하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: to fight battles on my behalf
But I will cause Pharaoh to be weak
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 바로를 약하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: when the king of Babylon attacks
